SQL.LOAD: SELECT search_config_id, company_id, dealer_id, created_by, created_date, modified_date, modified_by, search_config_assignment_id FROM elp_search_config_assignment WHERE search_config_assignment_id = :search_config_assignment_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_search_config_assignment SET search_config_id = :search_config_id, company_id = :company_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE search_config_assignment_id = :search_config_assignment_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_search_config_assignment ( search_config_id, company_id, dealer_id, created_by, search_config_assignment_id ) VALUES ( :search_config_id, :company_id, :dealer_id, :created_by, :search_config_assignment_id )
